detectors.description:
HDTUSDTPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HDTUSDTPool.sol#672-700) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(periodFinish.sub(block.timestamp)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HDTUSDTPool.sol#681)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HDTUSDTPool.sol#684)

detectors.description:
HDTUSDTPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HDTUSDTPool.sol#672-700) uses timestamp for comparisons

	- block.timestamp >= periodFinish (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HDTUSDTPool.sol#678)
